entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RadioButton - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5502
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Unable to build the latest MAUI (preview 14.0) project with VS 2022 for Mac Preview 7 (17.0 Preview, build 8001) #5499
  • Review accessibility properties used in default template #5487
  • [Enhancement] CalendarView #5486
    Future
  • [Enhancement] Shell footer template in lieu of WinUI NavigationView.FooterMenuItem's #5485
    Future
  • Images not rendering correctly #5484
    6.0.300
  • Please Make a Ribbon or Toolbar for .Net MAUI #5481
    Future

Closed

  • Error `Workload ID android-aot isn't supported on this platform.` on Windows #4363
  • workload install maui failing when installing microsoft.maui.resizetizer.sdk #5435
  • Linear gradient brushes throws an exception in XAML Editor. #4414
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • MAUI missing net6.0-ios #5199
  • Getting issue when trying to open a new window #4426
  • File Picker always returns cached copy of selected file on Android. #4195
  • PathFigureCollectionConverter.ParseStringToPathFigureCollection not working correctly #4450
  • Remove hard tabs from templates #5068
  • Mac Catalyst Publish Failure #5197
  • MAUI Blazor hybrid apps crashing on iOS / iPadOS / macOS #3980
  • OnPlatform markup extension defines properties for platforms no longer supported #4350
  • OnIdiom markup extension gets the Windows form factor wrong #4351
  • [Android] FlyoutPage not rendering #4083
  • [Bug] FlyoutWidth not initially sized correctly on Windows #2581
    6.0.300
  • Flyout works on Windows but not mobile devices #3700
  • [Bug] UWP Backward Navigation shows "B" page's TitleView content when ScrollView is in "A" page's TitleView #1073
  • [Bug] Toolbar item on a content page behaves different on platforms #3079
  • [iOS] Crash trying to launch an App using a NavigationPage #4048
  • [Bug] Flyout item selection not reset #2764
  • Page title won't update when switching tabs with top bars inside a TabBar inside a shell on Android #3743
  • Not rendering FlyoutContentTemplate #4801
  • AppThemeBinding not working (p11/p12) #4335
  • Having issue with svg files #4361
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Bug] ToolbarItems not rendered in Windows app #2589
  • Build Error NETSDK1032 when changing Platform Target to x86 on Windows #4503
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] CarouselView not rendering in Android after VS2022 Preview 3 update #2118
  • ViewModel databinding not working if element is inside StackLayout #4796
  • [Bug] Resizetizer - SVG with gradients does not work #2825
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Bug] Changing the default template icon names in the Resources folder breaks the WinUI deployment #1742
  • [Bug] Fix Issue with Compat Renderers not being able to easily locate Fonts #715
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Bug] Fix windows DPI code on FontImages to account for Screen Changes #716
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Bug] Font icon not working on Mac Catalyst #1286
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Bug] TapGestureRecognizer not working for Horizontal- and VerticalStacklayout #3989
  • [Bug] Grid's GestureRecognizers not working #2642
  • [Bug] Rectangle types issues #3022
  • [Bug] Not able to add axml files #3159
  • Indecipherable exception when loading a MauiImage into an Image view #2893
  • [Bug] SVG file with elements using "fill=rgb()" for the app icon will cause APT2259 error at build #3194
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Bug] [Android] Incorrect spacing of components inside Frame #3568
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] Dynamic time allotted size not reflect in maui view #3397
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Windows]Unable to create CanvasImageSource #3785
  • [Bug] Setting InputType on android entry fires the text watcher internally #451
  • [Bug] Any use of RealParent to locate the Application will currently fail #1445
  • Button not rendered correctly #1941
  • [Bug] [iOS] TableView using Commands on Cells only accepts clicks to some cells #2003
  • [Bug] Span doesn't have property ForegroundColor #2066
  • [Bug] [iOS] Contents in RefreshView don't expand to full width and height, set to -1. #2485
  • [Bug] Labels should have cross thread checking #2887
  • [Bug] Using Maui Essentials in a non-MAUI app throws an error on launch #1779
  • [Bug] empty space appears on ios #3139
  • [Bug] Hot reloaded polygon misplaced #2856
  • [Windows] Device.Display.MainDisplayInfo throws ArgumentException #4373
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Label FontSize is ignored when using FormattedText #4902
  • [Windows] Button in BindableLayout Don't Get Unhighlighted When Mouse Leaves #4918
  • Entry and Editor TextTransformation is not working #5095
  • [Bug] Unable to run either maui or maui blazor templates from the command line #2099
  • [IOS] Can no longer debug #4297
  • XAML Intellisense cannot resolve working stuff like in Xamarin.Forms #4137
  • Hot Restart Not Working for iOS on Windows with VS 2022 17.1.0 Preview 2 #3975
  • Archiving .NET MAUI Blazor Android apps not working #3816
  • [Bug] HotReload not working for inner view #3727
  • [Bug] Windows desktop application only runs in Visual Studio #3402
  • Run MAUI app on M1 Mac without Rosetta 2 #4476
  • The "Value cannot be null" errors are shown on an attempt to build a project with MauiVersion set to a previous value #4812
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [iOS]Keyboard covers the editor #5121
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • UnFocus Event of Editor does not fire when changing the focus to another view #5124
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Slider - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5147
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Blur event get invoked when focusing the input element #5201
  • Blazor MAUI <select> element - events not occurring #5188
  • clang++ exited with code 1 #4227
  • Frame Background not working on Windows #5490
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] KnownColor.SetAccent is currently not initialized on any platforms #3359
  • [Bug] WebView Related event failure, Android and cookie Setting failure #3130
  • NuGet Package Update causes issue compiling for non-windows debugging #3527
  • Label text disappears in template app #3524
  • Fix registrar invocations for Compatibility #5309
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Entity framework working at Debug but not at Release #4990
  • App icon not showing in build #3755
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Couldn't SideLoad the MAUI Windows Application #3799
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • RuntimeConfigParserTask #3810
  • iOS Local Time-Zone Is Set To UTC Only #3839
  • ContentPage.ToolbarItem not rendering #3842
  • Application crash while requesting the events from Microsoft outlook #3903
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • No Valid iOS code signing keys found in keychain. Please enable Automatic Provisioning from the iOS Bundle Signing page #3927
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Navigation.PopModalAsync not working on iOS #3959
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • External window, created with Application.Current.OpenWindow crashes the app on close #3984
  • MAUI JIT exception with DevExpress, DbContext and many other dependencies in iOS device only. #4147
  • Maui template project: The "ResolvePackageAssets" task was not given a value for the required parameter "TargetFramework" #4244
  • X509Certificate Algorithm 'RC2' is not supported on this platform #4352
  • Validate and review the changes required for the iOS NFloat #4353
  • SQLite in MAUI App not working on iOS #4490
  • xib files broken for .NET 6 IOS #4834
  • Publishing for ios-arm64 (via mac) mixes up mac and windows file structure and creates invalid filepath #5491
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Mac Catalyst] MAUI unable to connect with db EFCore #5284
  • BlazorWebView packaging change proposal #1283
  • Unable to configure theranchi.com theme in Blazor #1440
  • [Android] Wrong SwipeView size #4291
  • Crash during navigation with Navigation page #5168
    6.0.300-rc.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Picker: use default ComboBox styles on WinUI 3 #5501
    area/controls 🎮
  • Change platform type for ShellItemHandler #5500
  • Graphics events #5498
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Normalize RTL behavior for layouts #5495
    area/layout 🔲
  • [android] port maui_toolbar.axml to Java #5493
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [X] compile gridlength and row|defcollection #5489
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Reset pressed state if touch event is cancelled #5488
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Only show .NET MAUI templates in VS 17.2+ & maui workload installed #5483
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • AutoSuggestBox - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5482
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.1

Merged

  • Fix the main page #5497
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Implement pending focus management logic in Handlers #4914
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [LOC_HB] checkin of localized string files #5352
  • Slider: use default styles on WinUI 3 #5479
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Windows] Fix issues drawing brushes in Frame #5494
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, control-frame, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix the layout computation for the SwipeItems #5477
    area/controls 🎮, area/SwipeView
  • When swapping out root page on window remove toolbar #5466
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Blazor] Fixes Win UI deployed apps this time for good #5426
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [GH-4958] Platform behavior implementation #5043
    6.0.300-rc.1

Updated

  • Improved non-HTTP(S) link handling behavior #5313
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [macCatalyst] Fix DateTime and Time pickers on the mac #5475
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • [workload] move @(KnownFrameworkReference) to WorkloadManifest.targets #5429
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Fix TabbedPage colors in iOS 15 #5135
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/TabbedPage, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Windows] Implement FlyoutHeaderBehavior property #5345
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Add Resource Dictionary Template #5052
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix some crashing tests & localization #5261
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Conform the Essentials API to the rest of MAUI #5407
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [templates] add a new maui-blank template #5433
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [iOS] Fix clipping issues #5465
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Implement LineBreakMode property in ButtonHandler #4664
    area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Implement Padding property in ImageButtonHandler #4665
    area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [templates] add global.json to pin to .NET 6 #4767
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Update Editor scroll position #4850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Fix Android crashing issue #4860
    platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, high, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Custom implementation in SearchBar IsEnabled property #4882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [WIP] Enable Window Sizing #4942
    area/desktop 🖥️, .NET 7
  • Fix issue using LineBreakMode and MaxLines at the same time #5093
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix Shapes Aspect property #5225
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Fix SearchBar TextChanged event not working issue #5462
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Reject IPC calls from differing origin in Blazor WebView #5428
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Allow non-dot decimal separator in BindingExpression #5005
    area/Xaml </>, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/localization
  • Improve Glide usage for Image Loading on Android #5198
    6.0.300-rc.1
